title: How farmer's in India's Sundarbans area are using climate smart agriculture

tasks.task: Traversing difficult terrain to reach the project site
subtasks: Driving or walking through damaged areas

tasks.task: Participating in a pilot agriculture project
subtasks: Learning about soil testing and nutrient management
